titleStmt.title: An exposition of the five first chapters of the prophet Ezekiel, with useful observations thereupon. / Delivered in severall lectures in London, by William Greenhill.
titleStmt.author: Greenhill, William, 1591-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for Benjamin Allen, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the Crown in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Page numbers 173-176 repeated in page numbering.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 10th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the sign of the Crown in Popes-head-Alley
